153321212122222212122.content:
Kate found a mid-30 homeless when she drove out a few minutes ago. By offering him 1000 dollars for a clinical trial and a free meal was all she need to coax him into the experiment.

"Well I already have data on a grade school girl so I need some adult data." Kate mumbled to herself as she looked at the man who was eating inside of her lab.

"Okay, Terry. I'm going to inject you and experimental drug. Then after I gather some data then I'll give you your money." Kate said with a smile.

"Sure thing missy! Easy money!" Terry said.

Kate then rolled up the man's sleeve. Lathered alcohol on his arm, then picked up the injector gun and injected him with the serum. He didn't feel a thing as he was to hungry to bother at all.

"Okay done! Now we wait." Kate said happily as she gathered her things and cleaned up.

"That was quick! You quite some doctor! How long will it take to begin?"Terry asked.

"Flattery won't get you anywhere Terry! Oh the effects should happen soon." Kate said.

It didn't take to long to notice the Terry getting younger. He was quickly regressing as she saw.

"Just like with Anna!" She thought with excitement but kept a stone expression.

In less than a few minutes he lost 5 years. Yet he didn't notice a thing.

How far will he regress?
153321212122222212122.title: An adult male

1533212121222222121222.content: How far did Terry regress in age?
1533212121222222121222.title: Another age...

15332121212222221212221.content:
He was regressing rapidly much to Kate's surprise.

"Why am I getting younger?" Terry asked as he now looked half his age.

"Well the test was a youthening serum but looks like I need to rework the dosage as I made it too strong." Kate said as she looked at the data.

"Help me! Please reverse this!" He said now looking like a five year old as his clothes fell off.

Terry jumped off the stool and hurried as quick as he could to Kate. Slowly falling over as he crawled. He felt his body get younger as he curled up into a fetal position. He closed his eyes and he slowly disappeared.

"Hmmm.. second time this has happened." Kate said in a distraught and serious tone.

Terry had reformed in someone's womb. Who's womb was it?
15332121212222221212221.title: Just like Anna (Unborn)

choices: Mary begins to notice the unusual heaviness.
153321212122222212122212.content:
Mary was still watching her anime with her headphones on. Ignoring the kicks and bumps of her new daughter as she placed her left hand on top of her belly while her right hand on her chin.

Then instantly, her belly grew as it filled her lap. Her breasts grew larger as she now looked overdue with twins!
153321212122222212122212.title: Mary's

1533212122.content:
Kate continues to look around for something
To test on young Anna.
1533212122.title: Another invention.

choices: Ruckus a few hours later! A 100 foot tall 4 year old!
Anna grows 10 feet taller overnight! Panicked rush to a doctor
15332121221.content:
Kate then spotted her enlarging ray
or rather the control panel for it.
It was a random side project.
It was meant to solve food shortages should
she see fit to do so by enlarging even a
crumb into a meal.


Sure Kate could end world hunger but she only
meant it for herself and her family.

The device though hadn’t had a successful test
run. She thumbs the notes from last time
she had messed with it and realizes since her
last modification to the grandiose device that
she hadn’t tested them.


Now seemed as good a time as any and
Anna seemed like a docile enough guinea pig
as far as 4 year old children go.


Kate walked over to Anna sitting on the
stool, bent down and smiled at the
shy nervous child.

“Anna sweetie auntie Kate would like you
to help her out if that’s ok!”

“Hu-huh? Really? How”

“It’ll be really easy sweetie.
All you have to do is let me measure
you a bit and then stand still as long
as you can and promise to be a good
girl when asked okay?”


Anna thought for a moment and nodded
“Okay”

“Good”

Kate had her get off the stool and took
all kinds of measurements.

Height, she was a bit on the short side!
Weight, also quite skinny!
Chest just for reference.
Arm length, leg length, foot size,
waist, and hips.


“Good girl Anna. Now for the next part
like I said I’m gonna need you to stand
still here and be a good girl for as long
as possible okay?”

Kate guides Anna to a spot in the middle of
the lab. Anna nervously nodded”

Kate went to the growth ray control
console and then a large laser like
device lowered from the ceiling.
Slowly it targeted Anna.

“Ok sweetie as intimidating as this
looks I promise it won’t hurt.
It’s just gonna shoot you with a little
light that might tickle or feel warm”


Anna nodded nervously but kept her
promise.
Kate activates the device and a green
concentrated glow focusing outward
bathed Anna in its light.


Anna felt warm and tingly!
It only lasts for 30 seconds or so.
Kate turns off the device and examined
Anna to find no changes.

“Huh disappointing! Let’s try another go”

This time Kate bathes Anna with the
light for 2 minutes before stopping.

Kate examines Anna again to find no
changes.

Kate notices Anna fidgeting.

“What’s wrong sweetie?”

Anna blushed.

“I-I need to potty”

“Oh okay. The timing works well because
I can run a test later.
Just go in this like you were at the doctor”

Kate hands Anna a special cup with a lid
and leads her to a room at the corner of
the lab.

Minutes later Anna is done and the half
full cup is handed to her.

“Ok Anna this is the last try but it’s going
to be much longer! I’m gonna turn on
the device and leave it on you for awhile.
If you can please try to limit moving”

Again Anna nodded!
Kate activates the device again.
This time she left it on auto-control aimed
at Anna and went to handle other stuff.


A good hour or so later Kate returns.
Kate was shocked to see Anna still standing!
Kate turned off the device.

“Okay great job Anna!
Now just let me measure you again
and so long as you promise not to tell
anyone about anything today as a reward
you’ll get ice cream”

Anna’s eyes lit up and the girl
enthusiastically agreed wholeheartedly!


Kate examines Anna and finds that
Anna was 4 inches taller than she’d been
this morning.
It was promising yet disappointing.
The good thing was everything and every
part of Anna’s body though hard to tell at
the centimeters level had seemingly increased
in perfect proportions to her 4 inch height boost.


Oddly Anna’s clothes seem to grow too.
Kate wasn’t gonna complain though seeing
as this was eventually meant to be use on
food.

Kate soon kept her promise and let
Anna have ice cream.
Then Anna’s mom came to collect her.
15332121221.title: Growth Ray

info.brief_description: Kate Colins is an eccentric scientist, and definitely not your average mom.
info.description:
Message to all readers: I just want to thank Lucytgwriter for giving me this story! I have been enjoying it for awhile now and I am truly honored to keep it going for her. Please feel free to add to the story as you see fit. Also check out my Original story that I wrote called Son gets a new take on life. Please add to that story as well and if you have any suggestions please feel free to message me.

Characters:

-Kate Colins [36]:The mother of the family. Is a scientist [duh], and also very eccentric, which contrasts with the rest of her family. Usually optimistic and happy. She makes and does some pretty weird stuff. May sometimes experiment on herself, but thinks it's more fun to experiment with her family.

-Chris Colins [38]:The father of the family. Is a fairly normal father, usually seen with a newspaper. Childhood friend of Kate's. Will usually agree to his wife's experiments.

-Mike Colins [16]:The oldest child of the family, a regular teenage boy who is into hot girls, video games, and movies. Usually not willing to get involved in Kate's experiments.

-Mary Colins [14]:The middle child, and only female child. A nerd-ish introvert who is into anime. Usually in her room on the internet. Half of the time willing to take part in an experiment.

-Jake Colins [10]:The youngest child. Is your standard 10-year old boy, a bit annoying at times, and watches cartoons. Sometimes willing to his mom's experiments.

-Snow [7]:The family cat. She's a normal cat. Not much else to say. Kate may experiment on her.

Rules:

-No death.

-Don't make any changes [transformations or body swaps or anything] permanent [e.g. having the plot device break]. Though you don't necessarily have to change anybody back to normal, just don't make it permanent in the universe of the story.

-Try not to make the story dark, as this is meant to be a simple, fun interactive.

-No ending the story. [May have to delete chapters for this one.]

-Try to use your best spelling/grammar. While I [mostly] won't delete chapters, I will edit to make the spelling/grammar better.

-Please try not to link to images. A lot of chapters that do usually have the links broken a few years after upload.

-Adding new characters is allowed, but if they're in the Colins family, I'd suggest making them grandparents or cousins or uncles/aunts or something like that.

-Try to include a "something else"/"reader's choice"/"more choices" option wherever possible. I won't delete chapters for this one, but it's a nice thing to do. I know I'm risking a long chain of "no" chapters, but hey, the more choice, the better!

Feel free to add anything you want!
